entry.title: Friday: Periods of drizzle. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle or rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022
